overview: Live performance at Théâtre de l’Archevêché du Festival d’art lyrique d’Aix-en-Provence 2002. Daniel Harding conducting the Mahler Chamber Orchestra and Choeur de l'Académie Européenne de Musique. Directed for stage by Peter Brook.
tagline: Don Giovanni (2002) Festival d'Aix-en-Provence. Mozart / Italian.
title: Don Giovanni
